pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ordered Beta Regression Models with 'brms' // Implements ordered beta regression models, which are for modeling continuous variables with upper and lower bounds, such as survey sliders, dose-response relationships and indexes. For more information, see Kubinec (2022) doi:10.31235/osf.io/2sx6y. The package is a front-end to the R package 'brms', which facilitates a range of regression specifications, including hierarchical, dynamic and multivariate modeling.
